entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 6. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
